languages.text: {n}Ксенос выпрямился и взирает на вас почти что осмысленным взглядом, едва подернутым мутной пеленой. Кажется, нужен еще последний толчок — и ксенос выйдет из своего смертоносного транса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос выпрямился и взирает на вас почти что осмысленным взглядом, едва подернутым мутной пеленой. Кажется, нужен еще последний толчок — и ксенос выйдет из своего смертоносного транса.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}The xenos is standing tall and looking at you with faint traces of intelligence in his eyes, which are still hazy. It looks like one last push is required for him to emerge from his death-sowing trance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос выпрямился и взирает на вас почти что осмысленным взглядом, едва подернутым мутной пеленой. Кажется, нужен еще последний толчок — и ксенос выйдет из своего смертоносного транса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is standing tall and looking at you with faint traces of intelligence in his eyes that are still tinged with haze. It looks like one last push is required for him to emerge from his death-sowing trance.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is standing tall and looking at you with faint traces of intelligence in his eyes that are still tinged with haze. It looks like one last push is required for him to emerge from his death-sowing trance.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is standing tall and looking at you with faint traces of intelligence in his eyes, which are still hazy. It looks like one last push is required for him to emerge from his death-sowing trance.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is standing tall and looking at you with faint traces of intelligence in his eyes, which are still hazy. It looks like one last push is required for him to emerge from his death-sowing trance.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Le xénos se dresse de toute sa hauteur et vous toise de ses yeux qui, bien que toujours vitreux, ne sont plus dénués d'une certaine intelligence. On croirait qu'il suffirait d'une ultime chiquenaude pour le pousser à émerger de sa transe meurtrière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is standing tall and looking at you with faint traces of intelligence in his eyes, which are still hazy. It looks like one last push is required for him to emerge from his death-sowing trance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos se dresse de toute sa hauteur et vous toise de ses yeux qui, bien que toujours vitreux, ne sont plus dénués d'une certaine intelligence. On croirait qu'il suffirait d'une ultime chiquenaude pour le pousser à émerger de sa transe meurtrière.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}異種族は背筋を伸ばし、まだぼんやりとした目にかすかな知性の痕跡を残しつつこちらを見る。死を招くトランス状態から抜け出すには、最後のひと押しが必要なようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is standing tall and looking at you with faint traces of intelligence in his eyes, which are still hazy. It looks like one last push is required for him to emerge from his death-sowing trance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は背筋を伸ばし、まだぼんやりとした目にかすかな知性の痕跡を残しつつこちらを見る。死を招くトランス状態から抜け出すには、最後のひと押しが必要なようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋挺直了身子，看着你。尽管他的目光中带着微弱的智慧痕迹，但眼神依然非常模糊。看来，他还需要最后一步，才能从渴求死亡的恍惚状态中苏醒过来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is standing tall and looking at you with faint traces of intelligence in his eyes, which are still hazy. It looks like one last push is required for him to emerge from his death-sowing trance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋挺直了身子，看着你。尽管他的目光中带着微弱的智慧痕迹，但眼神依然非常模糊。看来，他还需要最后一步，才能从渴求死亡的恍惚状态中苏醒过来。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos steht aufrecht da und blickt dich mit schwachen Spuren von Intelligenz in den noch immer trüben Augen an. Es wirkt, als sei noch ein letzter Schubser nötig, damit er aus seiner todbringenden Trance erwacht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is standing tall and looking at you with faint traces of intelligence in his eyes, which are still hazy. It looks like one last push is required for him to emerge from his death-sowing trance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos steht aufrecht da und blickt dich mit schwachen Spuren von Intelligenz in den noch immer trüben Augen an. Es wirkt, als sei noch ein letzter Schubser nötig, damit er aus seiner todbringenden Trance erwacht.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}El xenos se yergue cuan largo es y te mira con un leve indicio de inteligencia en los ojos, que aún siguen perdidos. Parece que aún se necesita un último empujón para sacarlo de su trance asesino.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is standing tall and looking at you with faint traces of intelligence in his eyes, which are still hazy. It looks like one last push is required for him to emerge from his death-sowing trance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos se yergue cuan largo es y te mira con un leve indicio de inteligencia en los ojos, que aún siguen perdidos. Parece que aún se necesita un último empujón para sacarlo de su trance asesino.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Doğrulan zeno, hâlâ bulanık olan zihninde bir şeyleri oturtmaya çalıştığını hissettiren gözleriyle sana bakıyor. Onu bu ölümcül transtan çıkarmak için son bir gayret daha gerekiyor gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is standing tall and looking at you with faint traces of intelligence in his eyes, which are still hazy. It looks like one last push is required for him to emerge from his death-sowing trance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zeno dimdik duruyor ve hâlâ bulanık zihnindeki bilinç parçacıklarıyla sana bakıyor. Onu bu ölüm saçan transtan çıkarmak için son bir gayret daha gerekiyor gibi görünüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
